title: Coinbase CEO admits to broken UX, promises rapid improvements following customer feedback
description:
Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong said the exchange would improve the user experience on its main application over the next few weeks after conceding that it was broken in an Aug. 12 tweet. Coinbase broken UX According to Armstrong, the user experience on its application was below par, especially for non-fungible tokens, L2s, and decentralized applications. […]

The post Coinbase CEO admits to broken UX, promises rapid improvements following customer feedback appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Robust Bitcoin growth trend outpaces inflation, data reveal diminishing return concerns
description:
Quick Take The Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of Bitcoin, a pivotal marker of consistent returns, has been a subject of interest among investors and market analysts alike. Since Aug. 2019, Bitcoin’s CAGR has been estimated at around 25%. A closer look at the trend reveals a pattern of lower lows, sparking conversations around the […]

The post Robust Bitcoin growth trend outpaces inflation, data reveal diminishing return concerns appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BRICS Is No Joke, Bloc Could Become G7 Counterpart, Experts Say
description: The BRICS challenge to the world’s established economic order is not a joke, according to experts in the field of international relations.
